name: cherry-lambdas
description: These lambda functions define the backend logic for Cherry, a Bitcoin block explorer. The frontend repo can be found [here](https://github.com/tigeryant/cherry-fe). ## Functions * `get_block` - returns data regarding a specific block * `get_address_info` - returns data regarding a specific address * `get_raw_transaction` - returns data regarding a specific transaction
author: tigeryant
